Uses of Sprite in source
 

Methods in source that return types with arguments of type Sprite
 java.util.ArrayList<Sprite> Map.getSprites()
          get ArrayList of Sprites within map
 

Method parameters in source with type arguments of type Sprite
 void Map.setSprites(java.util.ArrayList<Sprite> sprites)
          set ArrayList of sprites for map
 

Uses of Sprite in sprites
 

Subclasses of Sprite in sprites
 class SpriteDoor
          Sprite type "Door" contains information to for hero sprite to teleport to new map
 class SpriteEnemy
          sprite type "Enemy" contain own moving algoritms to update its position
 class SpriteItem
          sprite type "Item" and load image for item
 class SpriteOrange
          sprite type Orange with lives and includes movement and collision processor
 class SpriteTree
          sprite of type 'Tree' and load tree image
 class Wall
          sprite of type "Wall"
 

Method parameters in sprites with type arguments of type Sprite
 java.lang.String SpriteOrange.update(int left, int right, int up, int down, java.util.ArrayList<Sprite> sprites, java.util.ArrayList<SpriteEnemy> enemies)
          process the collisions and update the position of sprite based on collisions
